short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Information About Farming Methods, Plants, Crops, Livestock and Gardening.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the information about different plants, crops, livestock and agriculture methods. This can also provides information about Indoor Gardening, Container Gardening, Terrace Gardening, Goat Farming, Fish Farming, Sheep Farming, Poultry Farming and Dairy Farming.
